p: We also conducted a finer assessment of the habitat utilized by sacred ibis using field observations collected during line transects. Each time the observers stopped their transect trip to measure by laser the distance from the transect line of each detected individual, they also recorded the detailed habitat category: stubble or uncultivated land (STU); sown field (SOW); meadow (MEA); plowed field (PLO); farmhouse or isolated houses (FAR); inhabited center (INH); tree rows (ROW); poplar grove (POP); banks of the rivers or embankments of irrigation canals (EMB); dry rice fields (RIC); flooded rice fields (FLO); partially flooded rice fields (PAR).
